[url=http://www.eagleresearchllc.com/member/41628/]Forex watch software [/url] Advice Every New Forex Trader Should Follow Boost your forex trading competencies. Do you remember I told you at the beginning of the page that back-test results are worthless? Well, THEY ARE! Forex Automated Back-test Results Are Worthless UNLESS You Can Validate Them With Live Forward Trading! What does this mean? Well, simple and to the point: if you back-test a robot and it shows 100% "demo" profit in one month, it should PRODUCE around 80-100% profit in LIVE trading. But can this success be replicated using a real account? We think not and any success would happen not more than a couple of times. 87 by midday.
